name: hellokahwin-migration-tool
description: Content migration tool from TWN to HelloKahwin with translation capabilities

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend

author: HelloKahwin Team
